summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road. A motorcyclist is seen approaching from the front, moving towards the left side of the road. The motorcyclist is wearing a dark jacket and riding a white motorcycle. The road is narrow with a speed limit of 10 km/h.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the motorcyclist. The vehicle is keeping to the right side of the road to avoid any potential collision with the motorcyclist.
key_objects: 1) Front: A motorcyclist, approximately 10 meters away, approaching from the front and moving towards the left side of the road.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a blue truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a multi-lane road. A white sedan is initially seen on the left side, moving ahead. Later, a blue truck appears on the right side, moving into the lane ahead of the self-driving vehicle. The road is relatively clear, but the blue trucks movement poses a potential risk.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while observing the white sedan on the left and the blue truck on the right. The vehicles speed remains steady to avoid sudden braking or acceleration.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, moving ahead in the adjacent lane. 2) Right side: A blue truck, approximately 10 meters away, moving into the lane ahead of the self-driving vehicle.

summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a multi-lane road. A blue truck is visible on the right side of the road, moving at a steady pace. There are no immediate obstacles or pedestrians in the vehicles path.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and direction, keeping a safe distance from the blue truck on the right side. The vehicle is driving straight without any sudden changes in speed or direction.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A blue truck, approximately 10 meters away, moving steadily along the road. 2) Left side: A black car, approximately 15 meters away, moving in the adjacent lane.
